verbose_text: The results indicated that, compared with the control and miR-NC inhibitor groups, miR-222 inhibitor obviously inhibited the cell proliferation/migration/invasion and promoted the apoptosis of HepG2 cells, which suggested that miR-222 inhibitor has a role in ameliorating liver cancer.
evidence: miR-222 inhibitor obviously inhibited the cell proliferation/migration/invasion and promoted the apoptosis
